website_summaries.verdict: The surface of this floor mat is designed for easy gliding while protecting your hard floors.
pros: Does not have to be unrolled
Many alternate uses such as dog mat or craft table mat
cons: Also can slide without weight on the mat or added grips

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for use with wood or laminate floor.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this chair mat for my office after having wood laminate floors installed. The mat is a nice size, and fits under the chair with a little extra space. It works fine for my needs. The mat is as pictured, and came in a flat cardboard box so I didn't have to unroll it, and it lays perfectly flat. BTW the mat has a smooth side and a slightly textured side. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KDG

customer_reviews.title: It may be fine by itself too but with a desk on top ...
customer_reviews.text: The mat shipped flat so there were no issues in laying it down. The edges are not tapered as some answers claim but it is thin enough to not cause any problems. I weighed it down by a desk so it does not slide. It may be fine by itself too but with a desk on top of the mat there are no issues at all. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Sensemaker

customer_reviews.title: yes! no heating or waiting to unroll!
customer_reviews.text: I like this mat very much. The fact that i don't have to unroll and add weights to flatten out is a huge plus. Ain't nobody got time for that! So far it's not slipping on my hardwood floors and i'm not crazy wheeling off to Neverland. I suspect with time i might be rolling around but so far so good. it also looks really easy to clean, so i'm looking forward to baby spill on it. great bang for the buck i think.
customer_reviews.author: Sailolau79

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: I love this floor protector! it’s light weight, strong and it was FLAT when it arrived. I must confess, I’m using this as a CRAFT MAT on my craft table and it is AMAZING!!! I Clean my old dirty paper and I’m SO PLEASED!!! It is just as I wanted and more!!
customer_reviews.author: ipadempress

customer_reviews.title: No lifting, Packaged Flat, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 2 months now. It came packaged flat (my favorite part about this product), it's sturdy, wooden chairs slide easily on it, and I've experienced NO lifting of the edges! It's big enough that I can scoot my chair around it and the legs never run off the edge. I would absolutely buy this again if I needed to. Update: its been about 6 months, its still flat and I'm ordering 2 more
customer_reviews.author: jackie cao

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I ordered two mats for our home office ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I ordered two mats for our home office after having new hardwood floor installed. They were shipped in a flat box. They appear trimmable, but the size is perfect, so I will not need to trim. They are thin and very sturdy. The shipping was quick (received in less than a week). Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jan14

customer_reviews.title: Proper packaging for a improper product.
customer_reviews.text: Showed up in a box in it's size, not a rolled up in a tube. It was about 2 weeks in and it started to wrinkle. Does not stay in one spot very well. It is a hard floor mat so that's to be expected but still, moved to much in my opinion. Hard to find a good mat for hard wood, and this is one of them to avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Husted

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my home office.
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed this one time but it never showed up on Amazon. This is a very good product. I'm using it on a hard vinyl composition tile floor. It is plenty big enough for a rolling office chair, lays perfectly flat and is hardly noticeable. The people who complained about not being able to get it to lay flat obviously can't or won't follow directions and as far as it being hard to roll out, I'm 75 years old with physical limitations and had no problem on my own. It's just what I was looking for. Thanks! Hugh
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Thin, bends very easy, not at all what I expected . I bought this for my Dad, he is in his 80's and this is a safety hazard as the the corners easily bend up and he was going to trip over it so I have to re-buy this. Unfortunately, I was traveling internationally when it arrived and I didn't return in time to send it back. The thin/flimsy construction renders this useless for us. If you are looking for a very thin flimsy version of an office floor mat this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Vic Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Good tile protection
customer_reviews.text: The mat provides great protection for the floor, and so far it has held up really well. My major complaint is that the thing slides around like crazy on my tile. One reason I chose this was because of the claim it doesn't do so. I would recommend adding something to the corners to prevent it from doing so (something I haven't done yet).
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier in TX

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Sizing was not even close to what was ordered. Specifically needed very close to the size I ordered. Was told that they allow slight variances. The one I received was off by an inch all the way around, which was outside their slight variances but they could not assure that if I reordered that it would be any closer to the size. It appeared durable so if size is not a big deal if it is off, then would probably be sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: bucketchick

customer_reviews.title: Floor mat
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this mat for my husbands shop room on a concrete floor. It is working well and he is happy with it. It arrived within the promised time. The only complaint we had was that it was shipped in a rectangle box and it took the shape of the box. Since it was wintertime and cold it took quite a while to get the many folds out. We put it in a warm room with books and heavy objects on it. A Suggestion would be to tape it into a roll before putting it into the box. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: perfect for protecting my floors
customer_reviews.text: I picked this matt up about a month ago. At my last house, my office chair rubbed a section of our wood floor in my office to a fadaded spot. This has definitly helped so far to protect the wood floors I just put down. It's completely out of the way, I don't even know it's there most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Waymond L Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Very large
customer_reviews.text: I have two desks with two computers that are in an L shape. I needed a large mat to protect my hardwood floors. This did the trick. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because it was shipped rolled up. It took three men and a baby to unroll the thing and then, of course, you have a lumpy mat. Recommend the manufacture ship it in a flattened state for ease of placement and no lumps
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: It's a great mat! Perfect size for our small home office and it arrived packaged really well. The new chair rolls around on it smoothly. Good price and I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Very timely delivery and excellent packaging to protect the mat during transit. The may is sturdy, a really good thickness, and seems to be a great value. Better quality at substantially less $ than other places. I did not rate the durability as that is hard to say after only a week (also the reason for 4 stars). So far so good, however. At this point, I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Beav

customer_reviews.title: Great mat to save your hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.text: Have old hardwood floors you don't want to scratch up with your chair or rolling chair? This is a great product with a smooth bottom surface and prevents rolling or scratching Mark's from your desk chair.
customer_reviews.author: Tim H.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cracking
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second mat. I use the mat over Berber carpet. The first one cracked and I went to the manufacture to get a replacement. I had to send pictures of the cracks, close up pictures of the carpet and pay $30 shipment. The replacement has cracked in two places and I am not going to spend another $30 for a replacement. At some point I'll look around for something more suitable, perhaps pick up another mat and put it on top of the cracked one. Disgusting!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaredee`

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product...I am returning it.
customer_reviews.text: This has been on my office floor for nearly a week and it still has big ripples. Nearly trips me every time I walk over it. It will not flatten out. You rolled it to ship and it does not work when it arrives to the customer. And it is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Skeet Workman

customer_reviews.title: not good for a public office
customer_reviews.text: So far not impressed at all unfortunately. The mat came with an explanation that they now "roll" them to save on shipping costs. This would have been alright had it actually been rolled, however, ours came with fold/crease marks throughout the entire mat. We now have a wavy mess even after putting weight on it over night. If it doesn't relax and flatten out soon it will be going back. Currently it's a trip hazard, not good for a public office.
customer_reviews.author: Court Office

customer_reviews.title: Great Mats
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice mats. One went under my desk chair. I ordered a second one to use under the kitty cage. They are multi-purpose!!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Peach

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and thin. Reeks of outgassing. Returning.
customer_reviews.text: This came rolled up in a box. I was really surprised by how light the box was since my past floor mats have been rather heavy. This is very thin, made of cheap plastic and has a heavy plastic outgassing odor. Filed for a return immediately.
customer_reviews.author: ffass

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job !
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and it surely will protect your hardwood floor. I have only one problem and that is it keeps moving around slightly. They say to put the smooth side against the floor and that probably is the reason it keeps moving around from the place you first put it.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Arty

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my new Marvelux Chair mat
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new Marvelux Chair mat. I was looking for a clear hard-floor mat so that the beauty of the floor would not be masked. The mat is thin and clear. It was delivered in no time at all. I am extremely satisfied with the product and the service.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Curl-free
customer_reviews.text: This mat is perfect...and a high percentage of my satisfaction is because of the way it was shipped. The mat itself is a very durable thickness but what sets this company apart is that it is shipped flat! No curling! Oh this was just a blessing by itself. :-)
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Slick, but works like it says
customer_reviews.text: Yeah it's a little slick, so be careful. If they made it tacky on the bottom, it would probably just stick to the dirt and still be slick. It works great for me because I have my desk setting on top of it that keeps it from moving.
customer_reviews.author: TradeHound

customer_reviews.title: Not for hard floors as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The mat size is good, but I have a tile floor in the office and the mat slides around. The tile floor is textured so you would think it would stay in place, but it doesn't. I think it would do well on carpet, not for hard floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and no curled corners!
customer_reviews.text: Nice that it arrived packaged flat so that I could put it to use immediately! No odor to the mat, works great on school tile floor, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Might create mold in older homes with hardwood floors in warm climates
customer_reviews.text: It's thick plastic and of course works as intended to protect the floor. However, its has a drawback to not protect the floor: being a vapor barrier. If you're like me with an older home (40s in my case) with hardwood floors in warmer climates, expect condensation underneath which will lead to mold. It's fine as a product, but be careful about its application.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H.

customer_reviews.title: looks fine
customer_reviews.text: even though it was supposed to ship flat, mine arrived with the whole package folded in half. however after 24 hours the crease was gone so its all good.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly to the dimensions described. It was supposed to be 48 by 60 and it is actually 48 by 58, two inches shorter than described. It is also a bit thinner than I expected. It should work just fine to protect the wood floor but slightly disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Haggerty

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: love it.. came packaged so well.. and whats nice about it . it doesnt have those lil spike underneath that ruins your hard wood floors
customer_reviews.author: MonaMee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This mat was the perfect thing for our home office. It flat and sturdy and works great on our wood flooring. It came packaged very well. It was also packaged flat (not rolled up) which was wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a new vinyl file floor to protect it from a rolling desk chair. It works great and it is not very noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for rolling chairs and hard surfaces
customer_reviews.text: I use this on hardwood floors and it is too slick (yes I have the textured side up) so my rolling chair never stops rolling. As a result I get back and leg pain constantly holding myself in place while working from home. I would not recommend this to anyone with a Herman Miller Arron chair, or similar chair on wheels, that has hardwood or tile.
customer_reviews.author: Customer X

customer_reviews.title: Great size. Perfect for the desk chair in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size.Perfect for the desk chair in the kitchen. Not totally see-through, but I like it nonethless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! A+++
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Shipped flat and just what I wanted. Great value, and works perfectly on our wood floor. There were no strange chemical smells. Would definitely purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly flat
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing is the mat is packaged and ships FLAT. Nice weight, 36x48 perfect size, can see laminate floor, Happy with this mat and price.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: This one has been perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my other one which had spikes at the bottom to prevent it from moving - which, subsequently, ripped up the paint on the concrete basement floor when I had to move it to clean up water when it flooded. This one has been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nanoschematic

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again if I needed another.
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight vinyl. Stays put on my hardwood floor. Delivered on time. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Pat V.

customer_reviews.title: It lays flat and was packed well. Does not slip or slide or curl up on edges.
customer_reviews.text: Product is perfect for my small desk and space. Protects my hardwood floor. Needed something thick and small to put under my chair. This mat was small. Most mats were too big. This was the right weight not flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Bicki

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for home office.
customer_reviews.text: Just a good size plastic mat. Thankfully no prickly points on the bottom to ruin my floor.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, but very slippery - my chair keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, but very slippery - my chair keeps rolling and cannot stay in place when I am sitting. I am constantly holding myself in place while working
customer_reviews.author: Albina

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Pictured
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to use as a floor covering for my dog's puppy pad. Great size and so much easier to clean up mis-steps and keep my hardwood floors protected.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda P.

customer_reviews.title: Gets rough fairly quick
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few months now. Its quality is not so good. It gets dirty out of nowhere.
customer_reviews.author: ANA MARIA

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far I am pleased with the mat. It arrived on time, well packaged. I like the fact that it was not rolled up but arrived flat. It is so much easier to use when the mats arrive flat. Was able to place on floor and roll the chair right on it. The chair rolls smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Pattypat

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: This product is useless. It was not flat and not rolled when it was shipped. Instead, it was folded in multiple sections, which created multiple folds in the plastic. It is impossible to get it to flatten out so it could be used. I threw it away. Do not waste your money on this product. It gets 1 star only because there was no option for a 0 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: This is the best mat I have found yet
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mat I have found yet. It arrived in a flat box, so no unrolling. It is very clear, so I can see my floor, and my chair rolls well on it. I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: The size is great
customer_reviews.text: The rectangle shape was exactly what I needed. I move around in my chair a lot during my work day. This fit my needs perfectly in addition to protecting my new wood floors
customer_reviews.author: Cindy P

customer_reviews.title: Won't lay flat- arrives rolled up and won't unroll flat- has permanent rolls/ripples
customer_reviews.text: Arrives rolled up and several months later still own't lay flat. It has permanent ripples and waves -- I put books on it at night to try to get it to lay down flat, but it won't. Don't buy it - a mat should lay down flat.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Daines

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This mat was a colossal disappointme too. Thin and cheap. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Wear a mask!

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat - Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this chair mat for hardwood floor. Packaged great/shipped flat, perfect, and have already put it under our desk chair.
customer_reviews.author: Swimfunwaves

customer_reviews.title: I wish there was something on the bottom that'd make it stick to wood better. It protects the wood though
customer_reviews.text: Slides around a little more than I'd want, I wish there was something on the bottom that'd make it stick to wood better. It protects the wood though.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you unroll it and put it out in the  sun to flatten out from shipment.
customer_reviews.text: Good thickness, lays perfectly flat on hardwood floor. Bought it for underneath a large parrot cage on wheels. Very easy to clean the cage does not put dents in the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Corners don’t fall easy
customer_reviews.text: Got at Christmas time and is still just have to be careful for corners turning up
customer_reviews.author: Momma Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great under the christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: We used it under the base of the christmas tree. It helped keep water from spilling on the wood floors. It also made moving the tree for small adjustments very easy
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: It protects the floor but shifts alot.
customer_reviews.text: It protects the floor but it moves a lot. So I am constantly having to shift it. Overall it does what it's supposed to and protects the floor. I would recommend it and buy it again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Latisha

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, perfect! Does the trick! Speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well and minimizes wear and tear on my hardwood floors
customer_reviews.author: MightyP

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: The mat is just the right size to fit in a cozy corner of my family room. It is textured on one side, making it look nicer than one that is just flat. The mat is clear, so my hard wood floor shows through. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BRD3

customer_reviews.title: Moves way to much
customer_reviews.text: Mat moved a lot when I moved from desk to desk.
customer_reviews.author: TechGeek

customer_reviews.title: so it was super easy to put to use
customer_reviews.text: This item came in a flat pack (not rolled), so it was super easy to put to use. It almost disappears on the tile floor. It fit perfectly, I was able to slide one edge into the area under my desk. Thankful to have a product to protect my new vinyl flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: possibly works with rolling chairs, but if the chair ...
customer_reviews.text: possibly works with rolling chairs, but if the chair doesnt have wheels the mat doesnt stay put, and ends up bunched up against the wall within a day or so.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Binford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed and exactly as described. It was a nice treat to have it delivered flat. No waiting for it to unroll. The thickness is quite nice but not too thick.
customer_reviews.author: sirhcm

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.text: Placed in Front of my desk on wood floors to prevent scaring. Love it and it’s clear aa promised.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Thompkins

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Description
customer_reviews.text: The description says smooth backing and they arrived with studs on the bottom. Sent all 10 back,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You came here for a translucent floor mat. You're getting a translucent floor mat.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what you expect it to be. Does not grip well on hardwood without some weight on it. Don't have momentum and try and plant yourself on this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Pete G

customer_reviews.title: Mat is shipped flat !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mat. The mat was ship flat!!! One side of the mat is smooth, the other side has texture. I put the texture side down, that helps to keep the mat in place. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: This product began to break after about 2 months. Now the entire case is falling apart completely. I'm very unhappy with it. It only allowed 1 month for a return, and now I cant even use it. It's a rolling bag, and was supposed to be sturdy. It's not at all!! Very unhappy!!
customer_reviews.author: soozie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality mat for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality mat for the price! Shipped flat in simple cardboard with no cracks or problems. Has been great for the chair, but may slip easily if putting a lot of weight on the mat (crawling around setting up cords under office desk). Be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Chua

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. We use it on our laminate floor and are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: sable95p

customer_reviews.title: Did not shop flat
customer_reviews.text: I went with this mat because the reviews said it shipped flat. It came rolled up tightly, it took 2 people to unroll it, then I place 4 boxes of laminate flooring on top of it and it took 3 days to flatten out. Once its flat it's great. But know it's a chore yo make it useable.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Purdue

customer_reviews.title: Unobtrusive floor saver.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my little home office. Protects the wood floor laminate. It's light but strong. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: bongo

customer_reviews.title: Spend more money to get a better one. I can't move because it's so small ...
customer_reviews.text: Spend more money to get a better one. I can't move because it's so small I'll roll off and since there's no grip whatsoever on bottom it shifts around
customer_reviews.author: Eclipse

customer_reviews.title: Great for rolling the chair over low carpet!
customer_reviews.text: The mat rolled out well on to the floor, as it was still warm from delivery. Stays in place!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ruth Pendergraft

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Shipped flat
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my space. Great quality. Shipped flat. I cant speak on if it bends upward or not. Ive only used it one day so far. I bought it for use on a faux wood flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not come in a flat box as other reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not come in a flat box as other reviews stated. Will wait to see how it protects new vinyl flooring.
customer_reviews.author: chattykathy

customer_reviews.title: good mat for the price
customer_reviews.text: good mat for the price. lays perfectly flat and i can see my hardwood floors through it. i was very happy that they shipped it flat.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Manzella

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned when this arrived because it was rolled up. But it unrolled easily and laid flat quickly. My office chair glides on it easily. I have had it a few months now and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Toups

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good mat to place your expensive gaming pc on if you have to put it on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Ray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great mat, works well, chair rolls not to fast, shipped quick. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Village of Arlington Heights Thomas Kuehne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Covers the whole area needed. Chair casters roll easily. Almost invisible on tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: My chair sinks into this and then won't roll. ...
customer_reviews.text: My chair sinks into this and then won't roll. It curls up on the ends and you can't roll as it shifts into the desk legs If you get a roller of the chair off the mat you have to pick up your chair to get back on the mat. It's a genuine Argh !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trudy B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mat!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my bird cage to stand on. Very nice mat!
customer_reviews.author: Leah E. Frye

customer_reviews.title: Shipped flat, works great to protect the floor
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to use with a computer chair and desk on a hardwood floor. I love that it was shipped flat. The edges lay down nicely. I recommend this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Texas_n

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with marks in it and I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice floor mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice floor mat. Sadly, I needed a larger size so I moved this to another spot and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Donna G

customer_reviews.title: Timely and appropriate delivery
customer_reviews.text: Suits the needs and functional. Just got it so we need to give it some time to see if it lives up to expectations.
customer_reviews.author: WIPFather

customer_reviews.title: Floorsaver!
customer_reviews.text: Using in office under two moving chairs, stopped wood floor from scratching further. Expensive—but I found this very good used one.
customer_reviews.author: Average Nick

customer_reviews.title: and looks good in my office
customer_reviews.text: The mat fits well under my chair, lies flat, and looks good in my office.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love this mat. it's durable and i can see the hardwood underneath.
customer_reviews.author: gregory weston

customer_reviews.title: Great on my new floors
customer_reviews.text: Great on my new floors. Bad side is having to unroll it to make it lay flat. If they could be.rolled the opposite way it might lay down easier
customer_reviews.author: Lawson Chesnut

customer_reviews.title: Good quality mat that fit perfectly in the space it ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality mat that fit perfectly in the space it was needed. Arrived nice and flat and was ready to be set in place right away. So far has provided a durable surface to protect our floor under the desk from the wheels of an office chair.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my office. It is not as sturdy as I would have liked it, but it does the job
customer_reviews.author: idcda

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for the large space under my husband's desk. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn A. Lagier

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR CARPET USE.
customer_reviews.text: If you are purchasing this for CARPET.....don't. The mat will fold up on you within the first week.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose
customer_reviews.text: Didn't buy it for an office chair, but it works great after trimming with scissors to place under a mini fridge to prevent heat and moisture buildup on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Wood Floor Protection
customer_reviews.text: It works well to protect my hardwood floor and does not slide.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Used it on hardwood floors to roll my chair on, and it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good chair mat
customer_reviews.text: Received mat, its good, just sometime it slides so do't walk too hard on it!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Tiger

product_meta.title: Marvelux Vinyl (PVC) Office Chair Mat for Hardwood Floors 30" x 48" | Transparent Hard Floor Protector, Rectangular | Shipped Flat | Multiple Sizes
feature_bullets: PVC HARD FLOOR CHAIR MAT FOR LIGHT USE - 30" x 48" - Great value under desk floor protection. Suitable for hard floors including: vinyl, hardwood, laminate, stone, tile and concrete. Not recommended for carpet, please see our extensive range of chair mats for low, standard and medium pile carpets.

SMOOTH EASY GLIDE SURFACE - This clear PVC floor mat is ergonomically designed to provide added ease of movement with rolling office chairs, which is proven to reduce leg fatigue by taking the strain off your back and legs.
SMOOTH BACK CLEAR VINYL CHAIR MAT - Effectively and safely adheres to hard surfaces to help prevent damage to hard flooring caused by your office chair casters or wheels.

EASY CLEAN & FAMILY FRIENDLY - No Phthalate, No Toxins, No Cadmium, No Tin and No Lead. Marvelux clear PVC chair mats are easy to maintain - simply clean the pad with warm soapy water, no harsh chemicals required.
SHIPPED FLAT - Our small size chair mats (30" x 48" and 36" x 48") are shipped flat and our larger size chairmats (48" x 51" and 48" x 60") are shipped rolled.
